name: Angsana Riads Collection Morocco - Riad Dar Zaouia

reviews.title: noisy and dark riad
reviews.text: We just returned from 2 days at Dar zaouia in Marrakech; the location of the riad is great, closed to the center, but the riad is dark, the rooms have low ceiling and the decoration is not delicate.

aka: Angsana Riads Collection Morocco - Riad Dar Zaouia Hotel
